li.label: cold
li.description: I'm cold and shivering. Did I pushed myself a little too far?

li.label: numbing cold
li.description: I can't stop shivering. I'm not feeling want to handle this wrong kind of cold anymore.

li.label: absolutely freezing
li.description: This totally out of my endurance of resisting cold. My hooves are numb and my teeth are chattering. When did a cold can be so painful?

li.label: sweaty
li.description: It's too hot here. I'm sweating and overheating.

li.label: hot
li.description: If I could just have a breath of cool air... I hate hot environment.

li.label: sweltering hot
li.description: I feel like I'm in an oven! I'm not sure how long I can handle this.

li.label: blistering hot
li.description: This place is searing hot. I think I could die from this heat!

li.label: ate kibble
li.description: I had to eat animal kibble. It feels like .. not being considered as a intelligent species any more.

li.label: was imprisoned
li.description: The colony had me in jail for a while, like a caged animal.

li.label: slept in the cold
li.description: I had to sleep in a unbearable chill.

li.label: slept in the heat
li.description: I had to sleep in unbearable heat. Can't we have air conditioning?

li.label: entombed underground
li.description: I've been underground too long. I feel like the weight of this mountain is crushing me. I need to see the sky and feel the wind.

li.label: trapped underground
li.description: How long have I been underground? I need to get out in the fresh air and spend some time under the sky.

li.label: cabin fever
li.description: I've spent so long indoors I feel like the roof is pressing in. I need to get out and see the sky.

li.label: trapped indoors
li.description: It's been too long since I've seen the sky.

li.label: stuck indoors
li.description: I'd like to go outside and get some fresh air.

li.label: spot other centaur
li.description: We got company. I am not alone, never more.
